Key Match Events: Cam Whitmore scored 18 points off the bench
Alperen Sengun tallied 23 points, six rebounds, four assists and five steals
The Rockets opened the third quarter with a 9-2 burst
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets rebounded after dropping the first two games of a five-game homestand
The Mavericks lost P.J. Washington to a right knee sprain
Klay Thompson posted 16 points and four 3-pointers for the Mavericks
Others: Dillon Brooks added 19 points and six rebounds
Kyrie Irving added 16 points, seven rebounds, three steals and two blocks
